comment.author: 45737647@N03
comment._content:
This photo can't be from 1870, as Wilton Robert Lockwood was born September 12, 1861. He didn't paint Lafarge, his mentor, until 1897. Kindly research your records to correct the date.

Thank you.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
The record has been updated from 1870 to ca. 1900.
Thank you for your comment!
